title: Regarding the new client
body: Is the new client going to require a completely fresh install of the game and a deletion of the old file/content?

replies.body: Shouldn't do. The client update's focused on the experience before the loading screen/after the victory or defeat screen (pre game and post game). That means there's a lot of stuff that's outside of its area, and those bits (in game character models, sounds, spell effects etc) are what make up the bulk of the LoL install in terms of file size.

I had a question regarding the new client as well. Recently the current one has been eating up a lot of CPU usage (since the most recent patch). Will this new client present problems for some of our computers or will you guys work on that?
